Package engine

Class MixedStrategy

java.lang.Object
engine.Strategy
engine.MixedStrategy
public class MixedStrategy extends Strategy
Represents a mixed bidding strategy, which utilizes both rolling averages and standard deviation in its decision-making process. This strategy aims to adapt its bid dynamically by analyzing historical bids, and introducing a degree of randomness to occasionally bid a lower amount.
